204.title: In His Steps (version 2 Dramatic Reading)
204.description: After a strange event at the Raymond First Church, Reverend Henry Maxwell asks his congregation a startling question: Will they pledge to try and do only what Jesus would for an entire year? Even more important, however is the question: Who will follow through the whole way? - Summary by Adele de Pignerolles

sections.title: Fred Morris (president of the Endeavour society)
Jesus, I My Cross Have Taken (ch.1)
Must Jesus Bear the Cross Alone? (ch. 20)
